sentences.sentence: Externalization of business rules using rule engines
sentences.translation: 利用规则引擎实现业务规则

sentences.sentence: BRBeans — enables the externalization of business rules.
So we need, at least in part, performance with balancing externalization and exaggeration of feelings.
sentences.translation: 所以我们需要，至少某种程度上的，适度夸张和外化的表演。
